sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect } from 'react'
import {
  Chart as ChartJS,
  CategoryScale,
  LinearScale,
  PointElement,
  LineElement,
  Title,
  Tooltip,
  Filler,
  Legend,
} from 'chart.js';
import { Line } from 'react-chartjs-2';
// import faker from 'faker';
ChartJS.register(
  CategoryScale,
  LinearScale,
  PointElement,
  LineElement,
  Title,
  Tooltip,
  Filler,
  Legend
)

const AreaChart = () => {
    
    const data = {
      labels: [
        'Jan',
        'Feb',
        'Mar',
        'Apr',
        'May',
        'Jun',
        'Jul',
        'Aug',
        'Sep',
        'Oct',
        'Nov',
        'Dec',
      ],
      datasets: [
        {
          label: 'Earnings',
          lineTension: 0.3,
          backgroundColor: 'rgba(78, 115, 223, 0.05)',
          borderColor: 'rgba(78, 115, 223, 1)',
          pointRadius: 3,
          pointBackgroundColor: 'rgba(78, 115, 223, 1)',
          pointBorderColor: 'rgba(78, 115, 223, 1)',
          pointHoverRadius: 3,
          pointHoverBackgroundColor: 'rgba(78, 115, 223, 1)',
          pointHoverBorderColor: 'rgba(78, 115, 223, 1)',
          pointHitRadius: 10,
          pointBorderWidth: 2,
          data: [
            0,
            10000,
            5000,
            15000,
            10000,
            20000,
            15000,
            25000,
            20000,
            30000,
            25000,
            40000,
          ],
        },
      ],
    }
  
  return (
    <>
    <Line  data={data}/>
    </>
  )
  }
  
  export default AreaChart
